article_title: Michael McConnell: Why Obama’s Immigration Order Was Blocked
article_text:
Late Monday night, a federal district court in Brownsville, Texas, entered an order prohibiting enforcement of the Obama administration’s program granting lawful status to some four million or five million undocumented aliens. Administration supporters immediately filled the airwaves with claims that the decision was a political stunt by a George W. Bush-appointed judge and would quickly be reversed.

They should read U.S. District...

twitter.description: In The Wall Street Journal, Michael McConnell explains that Judge Andrew Hanen’s injunction was not about prosecutorial discretion. It was about granting benefits to illegal immigrants that are not authorized by law.
twitter.title: Why Obama’s Immigration Order Was Blocked
